title: buildAndPushRelease.py fails on git 2.9.3
description: On git 2.9.3, checking if git clone is clean fails because the output message of git status has changed from "nothing to commit, working directory clean" to "nothing to commit, working tree clean".

comments.author: Shawn Heisey
comments.content: Wouldn't exit codes be more reliable than examining the text output?
